Extracted Variables:
- x: number of children's vaccines
- y: number of adult vaccines

Definitions:
- x: number of children's vaccines to be made
- y: number of adult vaccines to be made

Extracted Constraints:
- 50x + 75y \leq 20000 (mRNA constraint)
- x \geq 50 (Minimum number of children's vaccines)
- y \geq 0.7(x+y) (At least 70% of vaccines should be adult vaccines)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize fever suppressant: 50x + 75y

Note: The comparison operators have been replaced with \geq or \leq to meet the requirements of a solvable LP or MIP model.
